Figuratively, the term "necrophilia" describes an inordinate desire to control another person, usually in the context of a [[romantic]] or interpersonal relationship; the accusation is that the person is so interpersonally controlling as to be better-suited to relationships with nonresponsive people.

==Jon Engelman==
  +
One very well known case of early necrophilsm in younger males is Jon Engelman. He is well known in the medical community because of his morbid fascination with dead men, this is due to the fact that many necrophiliatic men are staright and 97% prefer intercourse with the corpses of women, Jon however was different he enjoyed males. He currently resides in Texas and has been charged with numerous counts of necrophilism. One such case is when he broke into a middle aged mans mosselium and stole the body and often slept with it in his own bed, He also kept a full wardrobe to dress him. The charges were dropped due to the fact that the relative(s) of the victim were all deceased.
